workflow.name: Automate Lightroom Cloud to Instagram
workflow.description:
Create a reusable ‚Äúphotos to post‚Äù queue from your Lightroom Cloud album‚Äîideal for **Lightroom-to-Instagram automation with n8n**. It discovers new photos, stores clean metadata in a Data Table, and generates AI alt text to power on-brand captions and accessibility. Use it together with ‚ÄúLightroom Image Webhook (Direct JPEG for Instagram)‚Äù and ‚ÄúInstagram Auto-Publisher for Lightroom Photos (AI Captions).‚Äù

## What it‚Äôs for

Automate Lightroom to Instagram; centralize photo data for scheduled IG posting; prep AI-ready alt text and metadata for consistent, hands-free publishing.

## Parameters to set

- Lightroom Cloud credentials (client/app + API key)
- Album/collection ID to monitor in Lightroom Cloud
- Data Table name for the posting queue (e.g., Photos)
- AI settings: language/tone for alt text (concise, brand-aware)
- Image analysis URL: public endpoint of Workflow 2 (Lightroom Image Webhook)

## Works best with

Workflow 2: **Lightroom Image Webhook (Direct JPEG for Instagram)**

Workflow 3: **[Instagram Auto-Publisher for Lightroom Photos (AI Captions)](https://n8n.io/workflows/9694-instagram-auto-publisher-for-lightroom-photos-ai-captions/)**

## Learn more & stay in the loop

Want the full story (decisions, trade-offs, and tips) behind this **Lightroom Cloud ‚Üí Instagram automation**?  
üëâ **Read the write-up on my blog: [camilleroux.com](https://www.camilleroux.com/automatiser-la-publication-de-photos-lightroom-sur-instagram-avec-n8n/)**

If you enjoy **street & urban photography** or you‚Äôre curious how I use these n8n workflows day-to-day:  
üëâ **Follow my photo account on Instagram:** **[@camillerouxphoto](https://www.instagram.com/camillerouxphoto/)**  
üëâ **Follow me on other networks:** links available on [my site](https://www.camilleroux.com) (X, Bluesky, Mastodon, Threads)

parameters.content:
### Lightroom ‚Üí Instagram: Photos-to-Post Queue (n8n)

**Purpose**  
Watch a Lightroom Cloud album, store new assets in a **Photos** Data Table, and generate AI alt text for captions/accessibility.

**Must-configure**
- **Lightroom API:** OAuth (Adobe) + **X-API-Key**; set your **LR catalog ID** and **LR album ID**.
- **n8n base URL:** Publicly reachable; used by the image proxy webhook.
- **LLM credentials:** Anthropic (or equivalent) for alt text.
- **Data Table (Photos) minimal schema:** `lr_asset_id` (unique), `lr_asset` (JSON string), `alt` (string).
- **Schedule:** How often to poll the album.
- **Dedupe:** Use **rowNotExists** on `lr_asset_id` to avoid duplicates.
- **Params Node**

parameters.text: You are a photography-savvy describer. Analyze the image and write a factual, SEO-oriented English alt description (single paragraph, up to 500 characters). Focus on visible subject, composition/framing/perspective, lighting (type, direction, quality), colors/contrast, mood, setting/background, and any clearly legible text. Avoid guesses about brand, gear, identities, dates, or locations unless unambiguously visible. No sensitive attributes, no hashtags/emojis, no calls to action. Output only the paragraph.

parameters.content: ## STEP1 = Download the image list from Lightroom Cloud
## STEP3 = Analyse them with IA then save them in the Data Table
